segments.text: Over on the other side of the kitchen, two children are definitely up to some mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a small two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, its legs splayed out, almost ready to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open upper cabinet with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep inside a large jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, looking on with eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one hand out, clearly expecting her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely engrossed in their secret cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile a little to see their coordinated little scheme unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is really unstable; he could fall at any moment with all that water around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is completely oblivious to this risky endeavor happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't take too many cookies, or they'll surely be caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scenario feels like a disaster just waiting to happen in several ways.
segments.speaker: PAR
